text: Wesley Trent Snipes (born July 31, 1962) is an American actor, martial artist and movie producer. He is best known for his role as the vampire hunter Blade in the Blade trilogy movies. Snipes was born in Orlando, Florida and spent most of his childhood in The Bronx, New York City.
